_header: A celuy que pluys eyme en mounde
Subjects: lovers, addresses to beloved; dialogues, lovers’
_description: De amico ad amicam and Responcio — twenty-one 6-line stanzas, in alternate French, English, and Latin lines

CULGg427.First Lines:
A Celuy qui pluys eyme en MoundeOf alle þo þat I haue
                    foundeCarissimaSaluz od treye amour…

BLHar3362.First Lines: A celuy qui ploys eyne en mundeof all tho þat haue I fonde…
BLHar3362.Last Lines: …Quant a vous venu ferrayI yow swere by thys day
